H0.text: Who recorded the original version of the song When A Man Loves A Woman . Otis Redding

H1.text: Who recorded the original version of the song When A Man Loves A Woman . Wilson Pickett

H2.text: Who recorded the original version of the song When A Man Loves A Woman . Sam Cooke

H3.text: Who recorded the original version of the song When A Man Loves A Woman . Percy sledge

A4.text: He is best known for the song 'When a Man Loves a Woman', a No. 1 hit on both the Billboard Hot 100 and R&B singles charts in 1966.

A5.text: 'When a Man Loves a Woman' was Sledge's first song recorded under the contract, and was released in March 1966.
